MCQ: What is generative artificial intelligence (generative AI)?
Choices: a: AI capable of generating text, images, or other media | b: AI capable of understanding natural language prompts | c: AI capable of learning patterns and structures of input data | d: AI capable of creating deepfakes

MCQ: Which of the following is an example of a large language model (LLM) chatbot?
Choices: a: Stable Diffusion | b: Midjourney | c: Copilot | d: DALL-E

MCQ: In which industries can generative AI be used?
Choices: a: Art and writing | b: Software development and product design | c: Healthcare and finance | d: All of the above

MCQ: Which companies have invested in generative AI?
Choices: a: Microsoft, Google, and Baidu | b: Apple, Amazon, and Facebook | c: IBM, Oracle, and Intel | d: Tesla, SpaceX, and Netflix

MCQ: What are some concerns associated with generative AI?
Choices: a: Cybercrime and fake news | b: Data privacy and security | c: Ethical implications and misuse | d: All of the above
